title.narrative: ACCESS TO VIOLENCE PREVENTION, REPORTING AND RESPONSE MECHANISMS

description.narrative: By 2022, children and caregivers have access to violence prevention, reporting and response mechanisms, which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, the most vulnerable children in Ukraine benefit from more-child-friendly and family-oriented social welfare and justice systems.

mailing-address.narrative: United Nations Integrated Office 1 Klovskiy Uzviz 01021 Kiev

sector.narrative: Ending violence against women and girls
Parent/caregiver education and programmes on violence, exploitation and abuse - across the life cycle
Services to prevent or respond to violence, exploitation and abuse
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Technical assistance - Prevention and response services for violence against children
Violence, exploitation, and abuse - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use

related-activity.ref: 4410/A0/05/882 CHILD-FRIENDLY AND FAMILY-ORIENTED SOCIAL WELFARE AND JUSTICE SYSTEMS

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2022, children and caregivers have access to violence prevention, reporting and response mechanisms

description.narrative: UNICEF continued the advocacy on elimination of violence against children in Ukraine aiming to raise awareness and understanding among national stakeholders. Meanwhile, UNICEF contributed to knowledge generation on child protection risks and vulnerabilities in Ukraine providing children, their caregivers and communities with evidence to prevent violence against children. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/01/2020

title.narrative: Young people in selected municipalities aware of child protection risks
Knowledge generation products on child protection issues
VAC related standards are introduced to the Government and other stakeholders

actual.value: 2019:Standard SOPs and referral mechanisms are being field- tested in selected municipalities
